titleStmt.title: To the right honourable, Francis Lord VVilloughby, Lord Lieutenant of the county of Lincolne, and Lincolneshiere the declaration and protestation of divers of the knights, gentry, freeholders and others of the foresaid counties, whose names are subscribed.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: July 19. London, Printed for Joseph Hunscott,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
